title: Integrated Problem-Solving and Instructional Design for Improving Javelin Throwing Technique

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Sports Techniques and Exercise Mechanics, with Experience in Basic Javelin Throwing
context.additional_context: Real-time feedback and video analysis conducted through smartphone-based video conferencing tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain the biomechanical principles of the three phases of javelin throwing (approach-run, throw, follow-through) with 80% accuracy
Learners can diagnose three or more technical errors by comparing smartphone-recorded videos of their own movements
Learners can increase their average throwing distance by 15% or more through four weeks of training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
